page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: {INTRODUCTION The 12 square km. of land we are studying is mainly arable farmland. There are 9 farms, the biggest is the fruit farm where I live. There is 1 village called{STENTON with a population of approx. 120 which is increasing.{WHITTINGHAME,}a smaller hamlet nearby also has an increasing population. {EAST LOTHIAN}is a beautiful all the year round even in the snow. The fields are like patchwork and there are green rolling hills and the farmers say the soil is very fertile. It is sometimes called "The garden of {SCOTLAND". { }We think we are very lucky to live here in 1985, and help to write the new {DOMESDAY BOOK}.
